text: @saraecook @realDonaldTrump & his crazy lunatic bunch! Should be a weekend of nonsense & full on ass kissing which will result in absolutely nothing! Great expenditure of tax payers money. Hope no one brings COVID-19 with them because you know masks won't be required. That would be a shame!
